subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Shooting a 70 in the final round, Phil Mickelson beat Jeff Quinney, who shot 71, finishing at 12-under-par 272 and joining the pantheon of great shotmakers who have won at Riviera.
snippet: Shooting a 70 in the final round, Phil Mickelson beat Jeff Quinney, who shot 71, finishing at 12-under-par 272 and joining the pantheon of great shotmakers who have won at Riviera.
